statements: SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE target_audience = 'Youth';
SELECT campaign_name, target_audience, test_group FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY start_date DESC;
SELECT AVG(conversion_rate) AS average_conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE end_date < CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT campaign_name, conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate > 0.05;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date < '2022-01-01' AND end_date > '2022-06-30';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, target_audience FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE conversion_rate BETWEEN 0.1 AND 0.5 ORDER BY campaign_id DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_name, target_audience FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE test_group = 'control';
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date, conversion_rate FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-03-01' ORDER BY conversion_rate DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_end_date, campaign_name, campaign_start_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_end_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_end_date < '2022-06-01' ORDER BY campaign_start_date;
SELECT demand_id, product_id, demand_date FROM product_demand WHERE demand_quantity > 100 ORDER BY demand_date ASC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01' ORDER BY campaign_end_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_end_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2021-01-01' AND '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_start_date ASC, campaign_end_date DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date < '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_id = 1;
SELECT campaign_name, campaign_start_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT test_id, campaign_id, test_result FROM ab_test_results WHERE test_date >= '2022-10-01';
SELECT campaign_id, COUNT(*) AS total_tests FROM ab_test_results GROUP BY campaign_id;
SELECT product_id, MAX(demand_qty) AS max_demand FROM product_demand GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY max_demand DESC;
SELECT * FROM marketing_campaigns ORDER BY campaign_start_date DESC, campaign_end_date ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT campaign_name, campaign_start_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, campaign_start_date, campaign_end_date FROM marketing_campaigns WHERE campaign_start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-02-28';
SELECT campaign_name, COUNT(*) AS total_tests FROM marketing_campaigns JOIN ab_test_results ON marketing_campaigns.campaign_id = ab_test_results.campaign_id GROUP BY campaign_name;
SELECT product_id, SUM(demand_qty) AS total_demand FROM product_demand GROUP BY product_id ORDER BY total_demand DESC;
SELECT * FROM campaigns;
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM customers ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE price < 1000 ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT interaction_id, interaction_date, interaction_type FROM interactions WHERE interaction_result = 'success';
SELECT * FROM campaigns WHERE start_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, budget FROM campaigns WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY budget DESC;
SELECT customer_name, address, email FROM customers WHERE email LIKE '%@example.com';
SELECT product_name, category, price FROM products WHERE category IN ('Electronics', 'Clothing') ORDER BY price ASC;

SELECT campaign_name, customer_name, interaction_date, interaction_type, interaction_result FROM campaigns c JOIN interactions i ON c.campaign_id = i.campaign_id WHERE interaction_type = 'click' ORDER BY interaction_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns;
SELECT campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM Campaigns;
SELECT product_id, product_name, price FROM Products ORDER BY price DESC;
SELECT customer_id, customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'John%';
SELECT order_id, customer_id, product_id, order_date, quantity FROM Orders WHERE quantity > 10;
SELECT * FROM Campaigns WHERE start_date < '2023-01-01';
SELECT campaign_name, end_date FROM Campaigns ORDER BY end_date DESC;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM Customers WHERE customer_id = '123e4567-e89b-12d3-a456-426655440000';
SELECT product_name, price FROM Products WHERE price > 50.00 ORDER BY product_name ASC;
SELECT campaign_name, result FROM Campaigns INNER JOIN TestResults ON Campaigns.campaign_id = TestResults.campaign_id WHERE TestResults.result > 0.8;
